Text.Page:
{@Rgn:47002$$Whitefrost Forest} still isn't safe for our researchers. I'd appreciate it if you'd go after those {@LinkCreature:47#1001#Tirkai grizzlies}. Thin out the {@LinkCreature:47#4001#argonomorph Dagonite crusaders}, and {@LinkCreature:47#2001#argonomorph caprin imps} while you're at it.

{@Creature:247#1002$$Salaine} at {@Rgn:47006$$Field Base Lunacy} will take care of your reward.

Thank you.

You've helped make us all a little safer.

When you've thinned out the {@LinkCreature:47#1001#Tirkai grizzlies}, {@LinkCreature:47#4001#argonomorph Dagonite crusaders}, and {@LinkCreature:47#2001#argonomorph caprin imps} in {@Rgn:47002$$Whitefrost Forest}, come on back.
